about_the_game:
Beat-‘em-up action on the high seas!

Play as a swashbuckling pirate on a mission to reclaim your stolen ship and treasure map! Fight your way through waves of rival marauders, steal from uppity civilians, and unleash fierce companion parrots in this fast-paced, belt-scrolling brawler packed with humor and mayhem.

Explore stages filled with unique hazards and dynamic environments —such as slippery rooftops, deep underwater, and horse-pulled carriage rides!

Choose from 4 unique pirate heroes, each with distinct speeds, attacks, and special moves, including Simon, Coralie, Portia, and the hook-handed Aldemar.

FEATURES

  • 9 stages with varied environments, enemies, and gameplay mechanics

  • 4 playable heroes with unique stats

  • Treasure chests with power-ups and weapons, including pistols and whips

  • Fast-paced gameplay - enemies quickly recover from knockdown attacks

  • Companion assists and special moves with short cooldown times, allowing for frequent use

  • Swift, satisfying boss battles that don’t overstay their welcome —no damage sponges here!

  • Up to 4-player local co-op

  • Classic Game Mode: This campaign recreates the original 1989 arcade game and retains its single-player, single-plane gameplay, as well as its graphics and music.

 

ORIGIN

Buccaneers: Shipshape is an official remake of the 1989 Buccaneers arcade game, created with full support from the original developer, Duintronic S.A. This revamped version introduces exciting new features, including Z-axis movement, additional heroes and villains, brand-new stages, revamped soundtrack and much more!
